amendment.description: To amend the Camp Lejeune Justice Act of 2022 to appropriately limit attorney's fees.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 6522 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 6522 proposed by Senator Sullivan. (consideration: CR S7227-7230; text: CR S7227) To amend the Camp Lejeune Justice Act of 2022 to appropriately limit attorney's fees.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 6522 proposed by Senator Sullivan.
